strong.span:
Torrington Public Schools are closed at least until May 20th as per Governor Lamont.
Torrington Public Schools continues to closely monitor the Coronavirus. This is an evolving situation. We will provide updates as we receive them from federal, state and local agencies.
Click here for more information on
COVID-19
For the 04-03-2020 Torrington
COVID-19 Community Update, click here
For tech help, please go to help@torrington.org

p.style: color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span: sites with Free Meals for Students 18 years old and under will start on Monday 4/13/2020.

span.style: padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span: Breakfast & Lunch Meals will be provided at these locations Monday – Friday from 11:30 – 11:50 am: Woodland Hills, 330 Highland Avenue in front of the playground and Northside Terrace at 4 Terrace Drive in front of the playground. These sites are designed for families who are unable to drive to the pickup sight at Vogel-Wetmore School. Only one person per household should come to pick up the meals and maintain a 6 foot distance between themselves and the delivery staff and others. Walk Up sites are made possible through the assistance of EdAdvance Transportation.

p.style: color: rgb(32, 31, 30); font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;;color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.span: Nuevo sitio de parada de autobús a pie

span.style: padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.span: que se puede recoger para estudiantes menores de 18 años comenzara el lunes

span.style: padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
padding: 0px; font-size: 11pt; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; border: 0px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

p.span: Se ofrecerán desayuno y almuerzo en estos lugares de lunes a viernes de 11:30 – 11:50 am: Woodland Hills, 330 Highland Avenue en frente del parque y en Northside Terrace en 4 Terrace Drive en frente del parque. Estos sitios son desenados para familias que no pueden conducir a la Escuela Vogel-Wetmore. Sólo una persona por hogar debe venir a recoger las comidas y mantener una distancia de 6 pies entre ellos y el personal de entrega y otros. Los sitios a pie son posibles gracias a la asistencia de EdAdvance Transportation.
